forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 13 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the emerging light bathes the city in a gentle warmth that encourages exploration and quiet contemplation. The forecast speaks of a day predominantly sunny, with temperatures gently peaking at a comfortable 74 degrees, giving way to a brisk breeze from the southwest. Expect gusts that will dance around your collar and tease the tips of your hair, providing a lively backdrop for the day’s activities. Tonight, the clouds will gather, wrapping the city in a soft blanket as it cools to around 57 degrees, suggesting that layers will remain your trusty companions.

Although the sun reigns supreme now, the lingering marine layer whispers of a somewhat moody fog that lingers near the coasts, a reminder of the ever-present reach of the ocean. The clarity of the sky invites outdoor adventures—perhaps a stroll through the vibrant Mission District or a leisurely bike ride along the Embarcadero, where the fresh breeze and wide vistas give one room to breathe and dream. Comfortable clothing, perhaps a light sweater or a jacket for the evening, will serve you well. As the day transitions to night, the promise of a cozy gathering with friends or a peaceful evening in a local café could be the perfect way to savor this splendid day in San Francisco.
